channel.title: Santiam Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Santiam Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End OR-242 East at US-20/OR-126
item.description: End OR-242 East at US-20/OR-126. Use US-20/OR-126 East for Sisters, Bend, and Redmond.

item.title: OR-242 East at Hood St. (To US-20/OR-126)
item.description: OR-242 East at Hood St. (To US-20/OR-126). Turn left to connect with US-20/OR-126 for Eugene and Sisters. Traffic can also continue east on current street for US-20/OR-126 East.

item.title: OR-242 East Approaching US-20/OR-126
item.description: OR-242 East approaching US-20/OR-126 in Sisters.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 south. Use I-5 south for Eugene. Turn right for Airport Road and Fair/Expo. Continue straight for US-20 west.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 south to Eugene.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 North
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 north to Salem and Portland.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 in Albany.

item.title: US-20 West (Carolina St.) at Main St.
item.description: US-20 West (Carolina St.) at Main St. in Lebanon. Turn left for US-20 East to City Center (Lebanon) and Sweet Home. Turn right for US-20 west to Corvallis (via OR-34) and Albany. OR-34 joins US-20 a few blocks north of here.

item.title: US-20 West - Park St./Carolina St. Jct. in Lebanon
item.description: Park St. north at Carolina St. junction in Lebanon. US-20 west turns left on Carolina St. Turn left to continue west on US-20 for Albany and Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West - Use Right Lane For Albany and Corvallis
item.description: US-20 West - Use Right Lane for Albany and Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West at OR-228 West
item.description: US-20 west at OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching OR-228
item.description: US-20 west approaching OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at US-20/OR-126 Split
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West at US-20/OR-126 split. Use OR-126 west for Springfield and Eugene. Use US-20 west for Sweet Home and Albany.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at Split
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching US-20/OR-126 split. Use OR-126 for Clear Lake and McKenzie River.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 west at OR-22. Continue straight for OR-22 West to Detroit and Salem. Merge left for US-20/OR-126 West to Albany and Eugene.

item.title: Diagram of US-20/OR-126/OR-22 Junction - US-20/OR-126 West
item.description: Map diagram of junction at US-20/OR-126/OR-22 junction on US-20/OR-126 West. Continue straight for OR-22 west to Salem; merge left to continue west on US-20/OR-126 West to Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching OR-22 on the west side of Santiam Pass. Continue on US-20/OR-126 West for Albany and Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East at OR-242
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East at OR-242. OR-242 is part of the McKenzie Pass - Santiam Pass Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East - Entering Sisters
item.description: Entering Sisters on US-20/OR-126 east.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East - Deschutes County
item.description: Entering Deschutes County on US-20/OR-126 east.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East Approaching Camp Sherman Jct.
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East approaching Camp Sherman/Metolius River junction.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. Use OR-22 west for Detroit and Salem; use US-20/OR-126 east for Sisters and Bend.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East approaching OR-22 in Linn County. In background is a West Cascades Scenic Byway sign. Turn left on OR-22 to continue on West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20 East at OR-126
item.description: US-20 east at OR-126. Turn right for OR-126 west to Eugene and Springfield. Continue east on US-20/OR-126 for Sisters and Bend. OR-126 joins US-20 over Santiam Pass to Sisters.

item.title: US-20 East - West Cascades Scenic Byway
item.description: US-20 east approaching OR-126. Turn right on OR-126 and continue ahead on US-20/OR-126 for West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20 East at OR-228
item.description: US-20 east at OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching OR-228
item.description: US-20 East approaching OR-228 in Sweet Home.

item.title: US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east to Sweet Home and Bend.

item.title: US-20 East - Lebanon
item.description: US-20 east shield in Lebanon.

item.title: End OR-34 East at US-20
item.description: End OR-34 east at US-20. Turn right for US-20 east to Sweet Home; left for US-20 west to Albany. Continue ahead for South and East Truck Route.

item.title: End OR-34 East at US-20
item.description: End OR-34 east at US-20 in Lebanon.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 233
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 233 - US-20 East/Lebanon/Sweet Home.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 234BA
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 234B - OR-99E/Albany. Approaching Exit 234A - Knox Butte/Fair/Expo. For Foster Lake, use US-20/Santiam Highway, Exit 233.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: OR-126 East at US-20 Near Santiam Pass
item.description: OR-126 at US-20 nearing Santiam Pass. OR-126 joins US-20 east over Santiam Pass to Sisters.

item.title: US-20 East - Hoodoo Ski Area
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east approaching Hoodoo Butte Ski Area/Big Lake Road/Benson Snow Park, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-20 East - Santiam Pass/Jefferson County Line
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east at Santiam Pass, Jefferson-Linn County line.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East at OR-242
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east approaching OR-242 west, for scenic Mackenzie Pass.

item.title: US-20 East - On West Approach To Santiam Pass
item.description: Snow Zone overhead and electronic message board on US-20 East at Santiam Pass.
